posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hail, ECBers!!!!

I come to you today with a more Toolset-oriented question. I would like to know whether it's possible to change the builds of the Henchmen in the NWN OC, SoU and HoTU campaigns, just out of curiosity. If so, how would one do that?

Thanks in advance,

Take it EZ!
